projects.description: The Regency Young Scholar Science Program aims to bridge the gap in science education for children who may not have access to hands-on learning experiences...
This video showcases a preliminary design of the website project that I participated in...
The Lunar Lava Tube Exploration challenge tasks teams with exploring a lunar lava tube...
Tutored students in Calculus 1, 2, and 3 at Orange Coast College...
Assisted my coach in teaching a group of 10 children from a community to play tennis...
